Articles.Content:
Hi, i finaly got the full version of KSP, im realy exited and ready to be part of this awsome comunity.

cheers from MÃ©xico 

PD. My english may fail sometimes.

Welcome aboard, nice to have some more Mexicans along too, i suppose you have an easier time with the servers since it\'s all over at your place, eh? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Enjoy your stay.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Ty for the warm welcome everyone! xD 

> 
> i suppose you have an easier time with the servers since it\'s all over at your place, eh? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

i download the sowftware realy fast, and if i had a problem i could go to squads HQ wich are just a few blocks away from my place ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> i download the sowftware realy fast, and if i had a problem i could go to squads HQ wich are just a few blocks away from my place ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I guess there are benifits to living right beside squad HQ.....
i could also give a personal letter in name of the comunity if needed Xd
